title: IAA Tonight | LeBron Wants to Own a Team AND Tom Brady Says There's A Lot of Bad Football
description: As if he doesn't already have his hands in enough business ventures already, LeBron James wants to own an NBA team and put it in Las Vegas. How realistic is it that one of the most popular players in league history will end up owning a team in the biggest party city in the USA? Plus, Tom Brady believes that there's a lot of bad football being played. Does he have a valid point?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Brandon Flowers)
